plot: To help her magic superhero friends, the God Hermes sends Wonder Woman on a mission to help free Hades from the clutches of Felix Faust.

Felix Faust, imprisoned in a mirror, fools Tala into letting him out, whereupon he possesses the Annihilator and casts Hades out of Tartarus. After her armor and lasso's full powers are activated by Hippolyta, Wonder Woman teams up with Hawkgirl to help Hades reclaim his kingdom at Zeus's command. Meanwhile, Wonder Woman and Hawkgirl must deal with their anger towards each other following the events of "Starcrossed".—wikipedia

Ever since Shayera has returned to the team, her friendship with Wonder Woman is still fractured after the events of the Thanagarian invasion. Flash tries to get the two heroines to reconcile, but they refuse to acknowledge each other. However, another issues arises, when Felix Faust tricks Tala into releasing Hades to attack Themyscara. Wonder Woman and Shayera must put aside their differences in order to stop Hades' rampage.—dawsonpersi
